mapper.sql: id, website_code, company_code, accessory_code, short_text, accessory_price, timestamp_from, timestamp_to, unit, update_flag
mapper.select: select accessory_code,short_text from crm_accessory_basicdata where accessory_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')

SELECT crm_accessory_basicdata.accessory_code, crm_accessory_basicdata.short_text FROM crm_accessory_headchar INNER JOIN crm_accessory_basicdata ON crm_accessory_headchar.accessory_code = crm_accessory_basicdata.accessory_code WHERE head_char LIKE LOWER(CONCAT('%',#{name},'%'))
SELECT accessory_code, short_text FROM crm_accessory_basicdata WHERE short_text LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO crm_accessory_headchar(accessory_code, head_char, all_char) VALUES (#{accessoryCode}, #{head_char}, #{all_char})

insert into crm_accessory_basicdata (id, website_code, company_code, accessory_code, short_text, accessory_price, timestamp_from, timestamp_to, unit, update_flag) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{websiteCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accessoryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shortText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accessoryPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timestampFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timestampTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into crm_accessory_basicdata
id,
website_code,
company_code,
accessory_code,
short_text,
accessory_price,
timestamp_from,
timestamp_to,
unit,
update_flag,

mapper.update:
update crm_accessory_basicdata
website_code = #{websiteCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_code = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
accessory_code = #{accessoryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
short_text = #{shortText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
accessory_price = #{accessoryPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
timestamp_from = #{timestampFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
timestamp_to = #{timestampTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_flag = #{updateFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update crm_accessory_basicdata set website_code = #{websiteCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_code = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accessory_code = #{accessoryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, short_text = #{shortText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accessory_price = #{accessoryPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, timestamp_from = #{timestampFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, timestamp_to = #{timestampTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_flag = #{updateFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
